title: Starter Chests
body:
Hello guys,

Is it possible to get an epic (1350) skin or legendary (1820) skin out of the starter chest you get at level 5? It looks like I have only gotten 975 skins.

replies.body: If they're just regular hextech chests, then yeah. 975 skins are more common, but you can get better ones.

> [{quoted}](name=RenownedWheat42,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1XFE6RhR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-17T05:02:58.558+0000)
>
> If they're just regular hextech chests, then yeah. 975 skins are more common, but you can get better ones.

Ok. So you if you own Jhin, they are forced to give you an epic skin? xD
Well guys, thanks for answering my question. I hope I get Cosmic Reaver Kassadin once I get enough IP to buy him on my smurf lol. Wish me luck!
Hextech chests can and will often give skins for champs you don't own.

No. The starter chest contains roughly the same content for all players

 "It includes an Ashe champion shard, a Garen champ shard, and enough essence to craft both of them. We’re also including a semi-random skin shard for either Garen (Sanguine) or Ashe (Sherwood)."

That was back when it was introduced, I don't remember if anything changed from what is gotten but it's all still basically a similar range of content 975 or below only.

No, they give you 2 Chests. One with garden and ashe and a random skin for each, and essence. The other chest has a random skin shard for a champion you own, which my question is if you can get a legendary or epic skin out of that chest.

>The other chest has a random skin shard for a champion you own

That's not true actually, I got a Riven skin on the second chest and I didn't own her at the time. I'd guess the second chest is a regular chest, so it should be possible to get any skin for it, including legendaries.

Actually that could be it, I don't recall it exactly but since I was so low leveled it's possible I didn't have any champions yet.
